pageContext._xxxcollectionOwnerNamextxt: Walter J. Brown Media Archives & Peabody Awards Collection
pageContext._xxxcollectionDescriptionxtxt: 1945-1995  The collection consists of 50 years of radio, television and film productions, papers, and photographs documenting the founding and growth of Protestant Radio and Television Center in Atlanta, Georgia.
pageContext._xxxcollectionNotesxtxt: This collection has been digitized by the copyright holder: The Alliance for Christian Media. Manuscript papers associated with this collection have not been processed.
